description:
An additional scenario that can be played with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

â–¼Added scenario
Conflict among Clans

Background:
The Scenario Contest winner from Japan.
Zhang, Sun, Wang, Liu, Cao, Li... The numerous clans that existed combined their officers to form forces and contended to rule the land. With clans such as the "Zhang", who boasted the largest number of personnel, including warriors such Zhang Fei and Zhang Jiao, and the "Sun", who had an abundance of capable warriors both in military and literary arts such as Sun Jian and his sons, which clan will be the victor?
name: Scenario [Conflict among Clans]
